mapper.select: select a.no, a.id, a.name, date_format(a.last_update, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as lastUpdate, date_format(a.last_login, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as lastLogin, b.name as teamName from user a, team b where a.team_no = b.no order by b.no, a.no
